name: aos-graphql
description: AOS modules for building with graphql. GraphQL Runtime implemented in Lua+C. ao GraphQL Server with aos integration. Arweave Gateway Implementation
author: Tyler Hall<tyler@hyper.io>

scripts.build: (mkdir -p build && cd build && cmake -DINCLUDE_SQLITE_SYMBOLS=ON -DINCLUDE_GRAPHQL_BUNDLES=OFF -DPROCESS_CONFIG_TYPE=sm .. && make clean all) && mv process.wasm process.sm.wasm
scripts.build:xxl: (mkdir -p build && cd build && cmake -DINCLUDE_SQLITE_SYMBOLS=ON -DINCLUDE_GRAPHQL_BUNDLES=OFF -DPROCESS_CONFIG_TYPE=xxl .. && make clean all) && mv process.wasm process.xxl.wasm
scripts.build:bare: (mkdir -p build && cd build && cmake -DINCLUDE_SQLITE_SYMBOLS=OFF -DINCLUDE_GRAPHQL_BUNDLES=OFF -DPROCESS_CONFIG_TYPE=sm .. && make clean all)
scripts.build:sandbox: run-p bundle:* && (mkdir -p build && cd build && cmake -DINCLUDE_SQLITE_SYMBOLS=ON -DINCLUDE_GRAPHQL_BUNDLES=ON -DPROCESS_CONFIG_TYPE=sm .. && make clean all)
